textBox.richText: Last day before Gunter had to go back (and I had to hit work). Definitely spring conditions...icy mornings and slushy afternoons, so we got a late start. Brought out both the new Rocker2’s and the S7s...but only used the S7s. Started with a couple warm-up laps under the C-lift, including Gunter doing Hole-in-the-Wall. Ended up hiking the cirque *twice* today...once to pick up the west headwall, and once over on Destiny, where we continued through to waterfall. Cool stuff back there...but a little slushy. Can’t wait to try it sometime when there’s less-baked snow! Also nabbed Belle and Brian’s Run. Good stuff...but yes, I’m sore!!!
